BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC
BasicDescription.Synopsis: This is CBBC. Programmes begin at 7.00am.

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover kids target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind. Callaghan and Benoit sort out another 'crime'.

BasicDescription.Title: Xchange
BasicDescription.Synopsis: If you're after celebrities, comedy or chat, this is the show for you. Includes Newsround updates.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: Tel: 0845 900 2222 (local rate) - remember to get permission.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy, where the students compete to win the biggest prize money can't buy.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Rabbit's Kin/Showbiz Bugs/Strangled Eggs: Classic Warner Brothers capers featuring the likes of Bugs Bunny, Tweety, Sylvester, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, and Road Runner.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Megamaths
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Division. Divide By 5: It's Kings' Cooks Day - The Kings of Diamonds and Clubs meticulously strive to divide the food for their five servants equally to avoid any criticism. W/S. [Signed]

BasicDescription.Title: The Experimenter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] People. Old Boney: XP borrows a puppet skeleton from a street entertainer and sets off to find out why people have skeletons and what makes them move about. W/S. [Signed]

BasicDescription.Title: Look And Read
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Earth Warp. Hunt The Alien: Ollie disappears to escape The Daily News, but his search for the missing space probe makes him weaker and weaker. W/S. [Signed]

BasicDescription.Title: Primary History
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] A Walk Through Time. Fashion: Tony Robinson takes a walk through two millennia of history and looks into our ancestors' wardrobes! W/S. [Signed]

BasicDescription.Title: Landmarks
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] World Environmental Change. Drylands: The Great Plains in the USA and the African Sahel. An exploration of the way human beings shape and influence their environments.

BasicDescription.Title: Music Makers
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] Tempo: This series of Music Makers combines a new musical, Infinity Diner, with documentary items featuring professional musicians to explore aspects of music.

BasicDescription.Title: Science Zone
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-14] Designing Your Future. The Future Of Materials: A look at the properties of modern and smart materials that exist now and are likely to exist in the near future.

BasicDescription.Title: Hallo Aus Berlin
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-13] German language series. In Der Stadt: We follow Jessica's country cousin on his journey in the U-bahn and through the streets of Berlin, as he finds his way to her house.

BasicDescription.Title: History File
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 14-16] Nazi Germany. Youth In Nazi Germany: Five part series on Nazi Germany.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: Testament
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-14] The Bible In Animation. Daniel: Series of animated Old Testament stories.

BasicDescription.Title: Job Bank
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Beauty Therapist: After her GCSEs, Sue Myers did a three year City and Guilds course in Hair and Beauty at Darlington College. She then worked in a luxury health club.

BasicDescription.Title: Job Bank
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Veterinary Nurse: Jo McEwen enjoys her work although she says it can take a while to get used to the 'gory bits'. Assisting the veterinary surgeons can be as demanding as it is vital.

BasicDescription.Title: Blue Peter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Catch up with the magazine programme with celebrity guests, music, sport, food, and a whole lot more. W/S. [Signed]
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Julia Jekyll And Harriet Hyde
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Edward's experiments are causing more problems than ever. Instead of preventing Julia from turning into Harriet, he makes her disappear altogether.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: There's A Viking In My Bed
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy about a 10th Century Viking who finds himself shipwrecked in a present day seaside town. Tim and Jack prepare Siggy for his wedding to Mrs Tibblethwaite.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Simon And The Witch
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy drama based on Margaret Stuart Barry's book. How can Mr Valdini keep his cafe open when there is no one to eat the spaghetti? Simon and the Witch decide to help.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Grange Hill
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Spencer has some bad news to share, as Robson finds himself in a tangled web.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Animadness
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Stay tuned for nearly two hours of cartoon fun featuring classic episodes of Looney Tunes, plus double helpings of Cramp Twins and Taz-Mania.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover kids target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind. Brush up on your French with help from the tourists, and don't mess with our wrestler!
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Rebel Without Claws: Confederate carrier pigeon Tweety must deliver a message to headquarters while avoiding Yankee cat Sylvester.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy where the students compete to win the biggest prize money can't buy.

BasicDescription.Title: Yo! Diary
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy series based on the books by Jonathan Meres. Steven is on hand to video the unexpected events at Cafe Dot Com.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround Lite
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC!
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Join the CBBC crew for all your favourite programmes, plus loads more! Tune into CBBC everyday from 7.00am to 7.00pm.
